ComicInfo.Title: Megadeath Part Six; The Animus War Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Megadeath Part Six: A rogue asteroid lands on Mutani-Isle.
The Animus War Part 1: April and the Turtles arrive in Jerusalem to cover a religious interfaith conference only to be met with unprecedented violence among the locals. Little do they know that the Animus has awakened and is spreading hatred in order to fulfill an apocalyptic prophecy contained in the Dead Sea Scrolls. During the conflict, a molotov cocktail goes off in Mikey's face and blinds him.
